Package com.epam.esm.util

Interface FilterMapper

public interface FilterMapper
This is a mapper interface that maps filter and sort DTOs to corresponding filter and sort objects. It uses the Spring component model and the CertificateService class. It also provides default methods to map String inputs to corresponding Enum types.
